import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { prods1 } from "../assets/prods1" import { FaRupeeSign } from "react-icons/fa" import Sidebar from "./Sidebar" import Navbar from "./Navbar" import aaxios from 'axios' function Aitem(){ const url='http://localhost:4001' const ff=['note','name','price','rating'] const [imgg,setImgg]=useState() const [imgurl,setImgurl]=useState('../../up.png') const cats=['toys','stationary','books','bags','bottles'] const aitems=prods1 const [data,setData]=useState({_id:aitems[aitems.length-1]._id-1, slug:'', price:'', cat:'', note:'', imgurl:'', rating:'', price1:'',}) useEffect(()=>{ console.log(data) },[data]) async function handleS(){ alert(data) const fdata=new FormData() FormData.append({ slug:data.name, price:data.price, cat:data.cat, note:data.note, imgurl:data.imgurl, rating:data.rating, price1:data.price }) } const handleC=(e)=>{ const name=e.target.name const val=e.target.value setData(data=>({...data,[name]:val})) console.log(data) } return(<>

{ff.map((item,i)=>( ))}
NAME VALUE
{handleC(e) }} >
{setImgg(e.target.files[0]) ;setImgurl( '../../'+e.target.value.split('\\')[e.target.value.split('\\').length-1])}} >


)} export default Aitem
